text:
Hi everyone, I'm currently working through the HubSpot CMS for Developers cert and am using the command `hs upload basic-template-demo.html basic-template-demo.html`, as described in the video, to upload an html file to the design manager.

However, I keep getting this response and cannot find an answer in the docs. Does anyone have any insight? Thank you in advance.

`[ERROR] "basic-template-demo.html" is in a project folder. Did you mean "hs project upload"?`
